tool_description: Validates and optimizes delivery time windows based on customer preferences and operational constraints.

preferred_start_times.description: Customer preferred delivery start times in HH:MM format

preferred_end_times.description: Customer preferred delivery end times in HH:MM format

delivery_date.description: Target delivery date in YYYY-MM-DD format

service_duration.description: Average service time per delivery in minutes

error_messages: Array length mismatch: Customer IDs, start times, and end times arrays must have equal lengths.
Invalid time format: Use HH:MM format for delivery window times.
Invalid date format: Use YYYY-MM-DD format for delivery date.
Invalid time window: Start time must be earlier than end time for each customer.
Service duration out of range: Service duration must be between 1 and 240 minutes.
usage: Provide customer delivery preferences with target date and service duration. Returns validated time windows and conflict analysis.

conflicting_customers.description: Customer IDs with problematic time windows

total_delivery_time.description: Total estimated delivery time in minutes
